channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chris Mony

item.title: My experience with Working Out Loud (WOL)
item.description: During my last internship, I got to learn a lot of awesome things. Besides slide-building and clear communication, I was exposed to the Working Out Loud (WOL) method by John Stepper. WOL is a method, where a few people come together to form a so-called circle.
item.content: During my last internship, I got to learn a lot of awesome things. Besides slide-building and clear communication, I was exposed to the Working Out Loud (WOL) method by John Stepper. WOL is a method, where a few people come together to form a so-called circle.
